title: Drawing, "Cabinet", September 30, 1930
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: NOTE!/BASE TO FIT IN OPEN TOP/WOOD COMB.#2 OF BEDROOM #7246/ANDAMAN KOA & BLACK LACQUER; Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K. 9/30/33; Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"-1'0"/7360 [circled]; inscribed dimensions, instructions, materials
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for cabinet/shelving unit. Tray-like top section in black lacquer, for books; two shelves below in andaman koa, base in black lacquer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cabinet", September 30, 1930.
September 30, 1930. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-867.
